name: thepastelpeach
profile:
the name's thepastelpeach, peach around these parts, and I'm an independent free-lance artist. 

I make most of my money doing commission work so it doesn't leave me much time for youtube stuff, but if you wanted to see more videos from me (stuff like speedpaints, animatics, and live streams) then please support me over on my patreon!! 

any little bit helps: https://www.patreon.com/thepastelpeach

this channel is [[NOT FOR KIDS]], so i swear to god if the FTC even looks at this channel i will stomp them to death with my hooves
